posts.post_title: WTB...Well centered SGC 1-1.5 Cobb Red portrait
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy a well centered SGC 1-1.5 Red Cobb portrait.  Send me what you have for sale.


Mark Fober

I have a red Cobb if you're okay with a PSA slab. If so, I can email or text you the pictures.
